pages.text: $(item)Surf 'n' Turf$() is a Food item cooked in the $(pot)Ultimate Crock Pot$(). It is cooked by adding any $(thing)Meats$() and $(thing)Fishes$() with a total Fish/Seafood value of 1.5 or higher and a total Meat value of all the ingredients of 2.5 or higher. It takes 10 seconds to cook.
